identity.name: E1 Enterprise Swiss
identity.description: A high-precision, content-first design system for Enterprise Knowledge Management. Merges the objectivity of Swiss Style with the functional density of modern SaaS. Rejects 'friendly' rounded blobs in favor of structured, grid-aligned clarity.

body.usage: Long-form text, UI labels, Data tables

typography.guidelines: Headings should be tight (tracking-tight). Labels should be uppercase and spaced (tracking-wider). Never use pure black for body text; use Zinc-600 to Zinc-800.

dashboard_grid.rules: High density. No jagged bottoms. Use 'col-span-2' for main metrics.

search_interface.structure: Central input field (h-16, text-lg) with instant-results dropdown. RAG Chat appears as a slide-over or split-pane on the right.
search_interface.visuals: Input field should have a 'glow' effect on focus (ring-4 ring-blue-500/10).

document_upload.visuals: Large dashed area that animates/lights up on drag-over. Use 'border-dashed border-2 border-zinc-200' by default, 'border-blue-500 bg-blue-50' on hover.

buttons.default: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all shadow-sm active:scale-[0.98]

cards.style: bg-white border border-zinc-200 rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.style: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

navigation.sidebar: w-64 border-r border-zinc-200 bg-zinc-50/50 flex flex-col h-full
navigation.topbar: h-16 border-b border-zinc-200 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md sticky top-0 z-50 px-6 flex items-center justify-between

images.logo_placeholder: Use a simple geometric shape (e.g., a square with a cut corner) using CSS or an SVG icon.

universal_rules: No full-screen heavy gradients. Use subtle noise or white space.
Borders are your friend. Use 1px zinc-200 borders to define space.
Data-Density: High. Don't waste space in the dashboard.
Contrast: Text must be accessible. Avoid gray-on-gray for essential text.
Interactive elements must always have a hover state.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js to use the 'zinc' color palette for grays and 'blue' for primary/accent.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar + Header structure.
4. Implement the 'AuthLayout' for Login/Register using the split-screen design.
5. Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
